messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Zack is connected to Matt, Eva, Amy, Gia, Ming, and Prem. Nisha is connected to Reza, Wim, Raj, Jing, and Wei. Raj is connected to Jing, Wei, Reza, and Wim. Pam is connected to Jing, Kim, Ian, Moin, and Puja. Moin is connected to Puja, Pari, Kim, and Ian. Ming is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, Amy, and Gia. Wei is connected to Reza, Wim, and Eva. Kim is connected to Ian, Puja, and Pari. Ian is connected to Puja and Pari. Gia is connected to Prem, Matt, Eva, and Amy. Reza is connected to Wim, and Jing. Puja is connected to scholars Pari. Prem is connected to Matt, Eva, and Amy. Wim is connected to Jing. Pari is connected to Amy. Amy is connected to Matt. Matt is connected to Eva. You have been told that Prem is donating 50 books and Moin is donating 10 books and Sara is not donating any book. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books? Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

The first name will be the person with the maximum number of books and the last name will be the person with the minimum number of books.

The correct order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Puja, Prem, Amir, Reza, Matt, Amy, and Gia.

Puja has a total of 10 books. So the answer to this question is the person who has the maximum number of books. In this case, it is Puja.

Prem has a total of 20 books. The next person in the order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Prem.

From Reza, the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books is Amir, Puja, Prem, Reza, Matt, Amy, and Gia.

In this case, the first name is the person with the maximum number of books. So the answer to this question is Puja.

user: Imagine a group of 21 scholars. Amir is connected to Wim, Raj, Jing, Wei, Nisha, and Reza. Sara is connected to Pari, Pam, Kim, Ian, Moin,

Now you have been told Sara is donating 100 books. Now, from Amir what is the shortest path to the person with the maximum number of books?  Remember that you can take books only from one person. Starting from Amir, please list the scholar names in order, including Amir, separated by commas.

assistant:  The first will be the person with the maximum number of books and the last name will be the person with the minimum number of books.

The correct order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Puja, Prem, Amir, Reza, Matt, Amy, and Gia.

Puja has a total of 10 books. So the answer to this question is the person who has the maximum number of books. In this case, it is Puja.

Prem has a total of 20 books. The next person in the order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Prem.

Reza has a total of 50 books. The next person in the order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Reza.

Matt has a total of 30 books. The next person in the order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Matt.

Amy has a total of 40 books. The next person in the order of the scholar names from Amir to the person with the maximum number of books is Amy.
